discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment:
https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/blob/9bfc9834b46c1e492aaaf257cfa811d1e5e39065/mathcomp/ssreflect/div.v#L950-L963
The latter two should probably be `coprimeX(l|r)` but I'm not sure about the former two. Should they be `coprime_pX(l|r)` or is it too much to do?

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: Done. Ready for review except CHANGELOG.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
~~I'm wondering whether lemmas such as `mulnDl`, `mulnDr` and the like should be renamed using "positional suffixes" (e.g. `mulDn` for left and `mulnD` for right) instead of `l` and `r`... Or would it be too much of a change...~~
This is actually a distinct issue that I posted independently in #617.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> The latter two should probably be `coprimeX(l|r)` but I'm not sure about the former two. Should they be `coprime_pX(l|r)` or is it too much to do?

I think it is too much indeed, let's keep it (as you did).

discussion.author: herbelin
discussion.comment: For the record, it seems that the change around `iota_add` -> `iotaD` breaks the compilation of Coquelicot on Coq CI (e.g. [here](https://gitlab.com/coq/coq/-/jobs/822996322)). Something related to `hide` not propagating the scopes of `iota_add`. In particular, `(ssreflect.Deprecation.hide (fun iota_add iotaD => _) iotaD (m - n) n)` interprets `m - n` in the ambiant stack of scopes (thus in `R_scope` in the case of Coquelicot) while it is expected to be interpreted in `nat_scope`.

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment: Since `X` stands for a variable `polyX` in the polynomial theory, using it in `poly.v` for exponentiation may not be a good idea.

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: Yes indeed there is a tough call to make here... I'd say when there is no ambiguity (like here) we could keep `X`. @thery, @amahboubi  do you have an opinion on this?

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment:
To be consistent:
```suggestion
Lemma dvdpNr d p : d %| (- p) = (d %| p).
```
and also add missing `dvdpNl`?

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: I think, at least for now, we should keep `exp` for polynomials.

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment: Done. I have also reverted `coprimepX(l|r)` to `coprimep_exp(l|r)`.

tags.description: Issue or PR about a refactoring. (reorganizing the code, reusing theorems, simplifications...)

commits.author: pi8027
